languages.text: "Откуда у вас, Механикус, такая любовь к замене плоти на аугментации?"

traits.locale_text: "Вы, Механикус, любите заменять плоть аугментациями. Почему?"

languages.text: "What is behind the Adeptus Mechanicus's enthusiasm for replacing flesh with augmentations?"
languages.original_text: "Откуда у вас, Механикус, такая любовь к замене плоти на аугментации?"

traits.locale_text: "What is behind the Adeptus Mechanicus's enthusiasm for replacing flesh with augmentations?"
"You, Mechanicus, are fond of replacing flesh with augmentations. Why?"
"What is behind the Adeptus Mechanicus's enthusiasm for replacing flesh with augmentations?"
"You Tech-Priests like replacing flesh with augmentations. Why?"
"What is behind the Adeptus Mechanicus's enthusiasm for replacing flesh with augmentations?"
"What is behind the Adeptus Mechanicus's enthusiasm for replacing flesh with augmentations?"

languages.text: “机械修会为什么这么热衷于使用植入物替代肉体？”
languages.original_text: "What is behind the Adeptus Mechanicus's enthusiasm for replacing flesh with augmentations?"

traits.locale_text: “机械修会为什么这么热衷于使用植入物替代肉体？”

languages.text: «¿Qué motiva el entusiasmo del Adeptus Mechanicus de reemplazar su carne con aumentos?».
languages.original_text: "What is behind the Adeptus Mechanicus's enthusiasm for replacing flesh with augmentations?"

traits.locale_text: «¿Qué motiva el entusiasmo del Adeptus Mechanicus de reemplazar su carne con aumentos?».

languages.text: 「帝国技術局の、肉体をオーグメティックに置き換えることへの情熱の裏には、一体何があるんだ？」
languages.original_text: "What is behind the Adeptus Mechanicus's enthusiasm for replacing flesh with augmentations?"

traits.locale_text: 「帝国技術局の、肉体をオーグメティックに置き換えることへの情熱の裏には、一体何があるんだ？」

languages.text: "Wie erklärt sich die Begeisterung des Adeptus Mechanicus dafür, Fleisch durch Augmentationen zu ersetzen?"
languages.original_text: "What is behind the Adeptus Mechanicus's enthusiasm for replacing flesh with augmentations?"

traits.locale_text: "Wie erklärt sich die Begeisterung des Adeptus Mechanicus dafür, Fleisch durch Augmentationen zu ersetzen?"

languages.text: « Qu'est-ce qui pousse l'Adeptus Mechanicus à remplacer la chair par des augmentations ? »
languages.original_text: "What is behind the Adeptus Mechanicus's enthusiasm for replacing flesh with augmentations?"
